com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.listener

Class DragListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.listener.DragListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class DragListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.io.Serializable
    Mouse listener that allows drag and drop for UI components.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
